input.sentences: the artwork was ecclectic and diverse .
many images were of half animal and half human creatures .
ladies in mermaid form were intriguing .
there was probably a legend behind many characters .
output.sentences: The new exhibit at the museum is an eclectic piece of artwork representing diversity.
It included human hybrids, half human and half different animal species.
My favorite was the intriguing ladies shown as mermaids.
Many resembled mythical figures like centaurs.
I loved the appeal to legendary characters of nobility.
